entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
